biography: Mikael, a familiar name at Kurk Golf, is known for his composed demeanor on the course and his thoughtful approach to the game. While he is recognized for his strategic play, Mikael has made only one appearance at the Hector Trophée.
Although Mikael is considered to be retired from Hector Trophée events, his presence is missed. It remains to be seen whether he will make a surprise return in the future.
